p: The content of the basil essential oil in the aerial part of plant of seven basil varieties was determined by the method of steam distillation according to [ 21], without using xylene. The contents of the extracted essential oils obtained from the ‘Ohře’, ‘Lettuce Leaf’, ‘Purple Opaal’, ‘Dark Green’, ‘Mammolo Genovese’, ‘Mánes’, and ‘Red Rubin’ varieties are shown in Table 1. Mean yields for the 3 tested pot cultures ranged from 4.0 to 17.3 (mL·kg −1) d. w. (dry weight) in 2015. Similarly, the year 2016 showed the values ranging from 3.7 to 17.7 (mL·kg −1) d. w.
